original_title: Nice to Meet You, Please Don't Love Me!
overview: A documentary on Asia Argento, made during the making of "the Heart is Deceitful Above All Things." Cinema has always been a part of her life, so much so that she cannot separate her childhood souvenirs from her film career. With Abel Ferrara, Peter Fonda, Marilyn Manson, Rancid, John Robinson...
title: Nice to Meet You, Please Don't Love Me!
